command_line: addthreads=${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} && (( addthreads-- )) &&   addmemory=${GALAXY_MEMORY_MB_PER_SLOT:-768} && ((addmemory=addmemory*75/100)) &&   ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/9/2/3/dataset_92315408-10f0-4894-a25e-faddeee37ed0.dat' reference.fa && samtools faidx reference.fa &&   ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/f/1/7/dataset_f17bd603-c519-4287-80f6-0025bcee05e7.dat' infile &&         samtools view -@ $addthreads -C      -o outfile  --output-fmt-option no_ref   -T 'reference.fa' -t 'reference.fa.fai'   infile
